title: Bloomberg Markets: Market Drivers, Eco Brief for July 6

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Carl J Riccadonna Chief US Economist Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing the economy and markets with Bloomberg Stocks Markets Reporter Dani Burger.
